page.title: 09Housing in Rathmell.
page.content: The southeastern corner of the block includes the edge of Rathmell village and there are several{detached {cottages}on the road to Wham. Some are {very modern}and new properties are being built all the time. Apart from this, the dwellings in the block are{farm houses, mostly of {stone,}some dating from the seventeenth century. Some of the farms have been split up and sold and the buildings are now {residences for non-farming people, either as permanent or as{holiday {homes.}There has been a vogue to buy old properties, especially{barns,}and {convert}them into{highly desirable {country dwellings.}There are one or two examples of this in the area.
